Summary: first saw craft going sw then stopped as I pulled Into gas station then returned on its same path wasnt a plane or hcp silver/white then just disappeared in front of me!
divs: sighting detailsi was driving down hwy 501 south to jays mini mart. just looked left an saw something in the sky tried to make out what it was but it seemed different than an thing ive ever seen before! i turned in to the store an kept an eye on it the whole time walked around a truck an it was going back the same way it had come from! the truck started to pull out i looked at it for a seconed an looked back up to the object an it was gone!! this was a clear day with no clouds anywhere around! theres no way this could get out of my sight in less than half a second!not when i could see 40-50 miles in every direction! it looked like a white\silverly cigar moving sw\then stopped for a few seconds then reveresed back the same way! then disappeared. i wish other people had seen what i just saw!
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Conway
There were no other sightings in Conway on or around September 24th 2012
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
